description: This file is the entry point for a React-based web application. It imports React, ReactDOM, global CSS styles, and the main App component. It creates a root rendering container and renders the App component within React.StrictMode context, establishing the initial rendering process.

methods.name: ReactDOM.createRoot
methods.description: Creates a root for rendering React components into the specified DOM element.

methods.name: root.render
methods.description: Renders React elements into the created root.
